question: I was released from the ER and noticed on my discharge paperwork that I have a pulmonary nodule on my lungs. My brother was diagnosed with lung cancer at this same age and I am VERY concerned for my own health. I have Type 1 diabetes, Ovarian Cyst's and other health issues. What would be the treatment for a patient with a histor such as mine?
title: Pulmonary Nodule on my lungs
